title: Marshall on help for Europe - situation

content.prompt: The ideas expressed in the excerpt were most directly motivated by the

choices.label: tensions created by the outcome of the First World War
desire to export more agricultural goods to Europe
devastation left by the Second World War
concerns about the need for mass mobilization in future conflicts

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience of a source.
